a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}MAN-IGI.LAL-an-ni lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ina UGU {LU₂}UN-MEŠ ša {1}ba-ri-ki-DINGIR ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni an-nu-rig 53 ZI-MEŠ {1}{d}PA-šal-lim {LU₂}la-rak-a.a uṣ-ṣa-bi-da a-na {1}u₂-ma-a-di {LU₂}qur-bu-tu ša DUMU-LUGAL DUMU-LUGAL it-ti-din
